revised_title: The Development of the Auditory Apparatus in Sphenodon Punctatus
tldr: The author investigates the development of the auditory apparatus in Sphenodon punctatus, focusing on the inner ear, middle ear, and associated structures. This research provides a detailed account of the embryonic development of the auditory region, which is essential for understanding the evolution of vertebrates.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Embryology
